definitions.definition: The grounds or property of a school , college , university , business , church , or hospital , often understood to include buildings and other structures .
examples: The campus is sixty hectares in size.

definitions.definition: An institution of higher education and its ambiance .
examples: During the late 1960s, many an American campus was in a state of turmoil.

main_definition: The grounds or property of a school , college , university , business , church , or hospital , often understood to include buildings and other structures .
secondary_definitions: An institution of higher education and its ambiance .
